value:
$WmMPID_サイリ,ch04_41_Sairi_F_Normal,Face|I do not understand your thinking,
Brother. Fie, why must you do the
bidding of the empire?$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|The scent of this flower here... It's
not like that nectar smell from before,
but something about it is so lovely...$k$pIt reminds me of... Oh! The field of
flowers from my dreams smelled just
like this!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|The dreams you had when you were
young, you mean?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Yes... I remember it smelling so good.
The other girls and I just kept sniffing
all the flowers!$k$pOh, and...one of the other girls
looked just like me.$k$pShe and I were like best friends...$k$pWe played dress-up, and—$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Dress-up?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Mm-hmm. Since we looked alike,
from the first time we met, we liked
to play like we were each other.$k$pWe would swap hairstyles, clothing,
and jewelry...$k$pIt was incredible how alike we looked.
As if we were copies of one another...$k$pOddly enough, I...don't remember her
name, though...$k$pBut sometimes, wearing each other's
things, we'd trade homes too... And
she'd come visit the castle.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Y-you did what?!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|...And then we'd meet again, and
I would wake up back in Askr.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Oh. So, you're saying it was all
a dream, then? That's a relief.
Sounds just like a changeling.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|I've never heard of changelings...
What are they?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|There are old, old stories about a
certain kind of álfr that would take
children and assume their identity.$k$pThe substitute álfr would, it's said,
take a child's place so completely,
no one would ever know.$k$pThe changeling would then be raised
in the place of the child...and so on.
Anyway, it's just an old story.$k$pThe way you described your dream
reminded me of it. That's all.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|Changeling...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Sharena? Are you all right?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|Hm? Oh, yes. Sorry...$k$pMy head just feels a little fuzzy...
How strange...$k$p
